page.title: 05THE WORK OF THE LOCAL VICAR
page.content: {The Parish of Michaelchurch}is one of the 38 making up the Deanery of Abbeydore,in the Diocese of Hereford. {The Vicar,the Rev.F.Rodgers,}lives in Longtown.He is Vicar of 5 other neighbouring parishes,a total area of nearly 50 square miles,with a population of 1000. A service is held at Michaelchurch every three weeks.Craswall has one every fortnight.In the whole group of parishes the Vicar conducts on average {6 weddings,8-10 Baptisms and 10-15 } {funerals per year.}Funerals are important social occasions in this area with an average of 200 people in the congregation.A "normal Sunday" congregation is around 24 people. In addition to conducting services the Vicar visits his parishioners in their homes,runs a Bible Study Group and is a Governor of the School.
